citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:22pm on
12/9/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the facility representative whom stated no one was
available to conduct an inspection today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:22pm on 
12/9/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the facility representative whom stated no one was 
available to conduct an inspection today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
